summary:
**Hogwarts Legacy (2023)**

Hogwarts Legacy is an action role-playing game set 100 years before the Harry Potter books. You play as a Hogwarts student learning magic and exploring an ancient secret. Developed by Avalanche Software, it's the first Disney-free game from them since being bought by Warner Bros. in 2017.

The game was highly anticipated but faced controversy due to J.K. Rowling's views and accusations of antisemitic tropes. Released in 2023, it broke records on Twitch and sold over 24 million copies by 2024. Critics praised its combat, world, and faithfulness to the Wizarding World but criticized its lack of innovation and technical issues. It received several award nominations.
